attraction_reviewComments: The Western America Railroad Museum is a very small museum but pleasant and well intentioned. It's too small to be worth a special trip unless you are in Barstow. It's located by... read more
This small museum is pretty cool. It has a lot of interesting artifacts and a small gift shop. A must see especially if you are a train enthusiast.
Good Selection of rolling stock for a small museum and displays of railroad artifacts, artwork, timetables, uniforms, tools and various other types of railroad items. Great... read more

The museum is bigger than I would have thought, both inside and out. Many displays and original equipment to see, cool for families.
mention_address: "Western America Railroad Museum, 685, North 1st Avenue, Barstow, San Bernardino County, California, 92311, United States of America"
